other_tests.findings: Minimal linear atelectasis in the left lung base; no intra-abdominal free air or fluid; normal liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, kidneys, and urinary system; prominent distal appendix with wall thickening, measuring up to 8 mm, and surrounding inflammatory fat stranding; no periappendiceal fluid collection or abscess; prominent periappendiceal lymph nodes in the right lower quadrant.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The distal appendix is more prominent than on the prior study, where it was fluid-filled.
